jobs.title: Barista and Shift Lead - Kaldi's Coffee
jobs.description: Oversaw baristas at high-ranked regional coffee chain and roastery in Missouri. Customer service, making food and drinks, and accounts tallying at shift end. Developed relationships across branches of the regional chain and assisted with process improvements.

jobs.title: Product Coordinator - Reflux Solutions

Answered questions regarding the product from parents, pharmacists, and doctors to help promote understanding of the treatment of pediatric GERD and EER (acid reflux diseases).

jobs.title: Barista and Shift Lead - Midnight Oil Coffeehouse
